description: This recipe should be used to setup a new Terraform deployment directory.

enable_terragrunt.description: Whether to convert to a Terragrunt deployment. Adds a terragrunt.hcl file in the deployment.

state_bucket.description: State bucket to use for GCS backend. Does nothing if 'enable_terragrunt' is true.

state_path_prefix.description: Object path prefix for GCS backend. Does nothing if 'enable_terragrunt' is true.

terraform_addons.description: Extra addons to set in the deployment.

mock_outputs.description: Mock outputs for the deployment to add.

inputs.description: Additional inputs to be set in terraform.tfvars

outputs.description: Additional outputs to set in outputs.tf.

raw_config.description:
Raw text to insert in the Terraform main.tf file.
            Can be used to add arbitrary blocks or resources that the engine does not support.

vars.description: Additional vars to set in the deployment in variables.tf.

terragrunt_input.description: Input value to set in terragrunt.hcl for this var.

value.description: Value of variable to set in terraform.tfvars.

title: Terraform Deployment Recipe.
